titles.title: Higher Education Sustainability Act of 2019
Higher Education Sustainability Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to reauthorize the University Sustainability Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Higher Education Sustainability Act of 2019
This bill reauthorizes through FY2020 and revises the University Sustainability program, which awards grants for designing and implementing sustainability practices on college campuses.
